check.name: EmptyCatchBlock
check.description:
Checks for empty catch blocks. By default check allows empty catch block with any comment inside.

There are two options to make validation more precise: exceptionVariableName and commentFormat. If both options are specified - they are applied by any of them is matching.

property.name: exceptionVariableName
property.description: Specify the RegExp for the name of the variable associated with exception. If check meets variable name matching specified value empty block is suppressed.

property.name: commentFormat
property.description: Specify the RegExp for the first comment inside empty catch block. If check meets comment inside empty catch block matching specified format empty block is suppressed. If it is multiline comment only its first line is analyzed.
